"I hope we can put our differences behind us, for science...you monster."  - GLaDOS

Portal 2 isn't just the funniest game you will ever play, but it's also focused on telling story with many twists, which you discover in your attempt to escape the ruins. New mechanics are introduced in a smart way, environment can be manipulated with portal gun.
As much as sometimes game will be annoying while you uncover the dirty little secrets of Aperture's past, it will also be rewarding after each level you will pass. Puzzled rooms will get more complicated with each level passed.

Um jogo que me deixa sem comentários só parabéns

I got the Xbox 360 version of Portal 2 in a desk-sale in 5th grade. I fell in love with the game, despite not really knowing anything about valve. I got the PC version years later (8th Grade) and it has so much more to offer than the Xbox version, especially in multiplayer. If you don't have this game in your steam library, buy it for the $10 price, it is wroth it! At least buy it on sale for usually $2. If you haven't played this game in a while I suggest you replay it. Thank you for reading! Oh also there are tons of great mods!
